oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aerial View South of Broadway, c.1960
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of an aerial view of the area south of Broadway in downtown Nashville, c.1960. Photographed by James (Hot) Dorris for the City of Nashville. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.);
